DOC.brief_summary: This study aim collect data assess number rotavirus related hospitalization 11 hospital Belgium - season 2006-2007 order develop proper age-cohort analysis time .
DOC.brief_title: Number Rotavirus ( RV ) Related Hospitalizations Belgium - Season 2006-2007
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective study use anonymised data , extract hospital database period 1st June 2006 31st May 2007 . IMS Health sale data use provide rotavirus vaccine coverage estimate ( Rotarix Rotateq ) Belgian population study period . Any additional source vaccine coverage status describe rotavirus vaccine uptake study population also report .
